name: Hidden Object: Secrets of Alexandria
description:
Discover mystery hidden among ancient rumbles of Alexandria. Go through stunning landscapes, wild nature, and forgotten caves of Egypt in our new hidden object game –Hidden Object: Secrets of Alexandria.
Enjoy searching for items in colorful exotic locations. Explore the World of hidden treasures. Find your way to the secret. Different game modes, cleverly hidden objects and increasing difficulty will make your adventure nice, relaxing and challenging.

Key Features:
- Hidden object adventure game in ancient Egyptian scenery
- 32 hidden object scenes
- 16 unique locations
- Over 600 objects hidden
- Match3 bonus scenes
- Zoomable scenes
- Scrollable panel with objects to find.
- Three different play modes: Picture, Silhouette, Word
- Three difficulty modes: Casual, Normal, Challenging
- HD quality of graphics
- Amazing sound effects
- Climatic music closely related with the theme of the game
